basics.name: Jiyeon Chun
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

courses: ICS 111: Intro to Computer Science I
ICS 211: Intro to Computer Science II

highlights: Analyzed the data of consumers' behavior on e-commerce and developed an effective marketing advertisement
Networked with professionas from a selective range of banking divisions to learn about their impact on the community
Learned how various departments contribute to the total success of the company
Achieved advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office while improving soft skills through actively engaging with workers
Attended the event to learn the significance of global marketing and technology and to foresee future challenges and opportunities in tourism
Planted a few thousand trees with nearly 2,000 participants to fight against climate change

awards.title: Korean Honor Scholarship
awards.awarder: Embassy of the Republic of Korea
awards.summary: Awarded to international students who demonstrated outstanding academic performance throughout high school career
